old: "日記の１ページが落ちている"
new: "A page out of a diary has fallen down."

old:
侵食されている魔物の行動には、
いくつかのパターンが見られます
new: There are several patterns observed in the behavior of the infected creatures.

old:
とにかく凶暴性が助長されるもの
侵食前と変わらない行動サイクルを持つもの
そしてこの魔物のように侵食から逃れようと
もがき苦しむもの――
new: There are those whose aggressiveness is exacerbated, those that maintain the same behavioral cycle as before infection, and those like this creature, who struggle in agony, trying to escape from the corruption.

old:
その姿は哀れを誘いますが――
侵食によって箍の外れた力は、一瞬でも
気を緩めればこちらが命を落とすほどです
new: Their appearance evokes pity, but the power unleashed by Corruption is so dangerous that even a momentary lapse in concentration could cost us our lives.

old:
この度の魔物は強敵でしたが
それ以上に苦戦しました
ベンジャミン様の動きが鈍く、我々が
それを庇っていたためです
new: The creatures we faced this time were formidable foes, but what made it even more challenging was that Master Benjamin's movements were slow, and we were protecting him.

old:
このままでは、ベンジャミン様のご友人を弔うはずが
我々自身の弔い旅になってしまうかもしれません
帰還し、ゆっくり休養いただけるまであと少し――
new: If this continues, our journey to mourn Master Benjamin's late friend might turn into our own mourning journey. We'll have to return and rest a little while longer until Master Benjamin can recuperate.
